languages.text: {n}Для того, что вы замыслили, не нужно знать премудрости управления древними технологиями — достаточно опыта со времен {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}службы в Астра Милитарум{/d}. Заклинить боеприпас в выводном канале и вызвать воспламенение в камере можно простым воздействием на затвор...{/n}

{n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Для того, что вы замыслили, не нужно знать премудрости управления древними технологиями — достаточно опыта со времен {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}службы в Астра Милитарум{/d}. Заклинить боеприпас в выводном канале и вызвать воспламенение в камере можно простым воздействием на затвор...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Was du vorhast, bedarf keiner intensiven Kenntnisse alter Technologien ... deine Erfahrung aus deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Zeit im Astra Militarum{/d} reicht gewiss aus. Eine simple Manipulation des Verschlussblocks reicht aus, um das Projektil in der Röhre zu verkanten und ein Feuer in der Kammer auszulösen ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intensive Kenntnisse alter Technologien sind nicht erforderlich, um durchzuführen, was du vorhast: Eine simple Manipulation des Verschlussblocks reicht aus, um das Projektil in der Röhre zu verkanten und ein Feuer in der Kammer auszulösen ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous n'avez pas besoin de connaître la technologie ancienne en long et en large pour agir, votre expérience {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}gagnée au sein de l'Astra Militarum{/d} suffira amplement. Il suffit de manipuler la culasse pour coincer l'obus à l'intérieur du canon et enflammer sa chambre...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous n'avez pas besoin de connaître la technologie ancienne en long et en large pour agir, votre expérience {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}gagnée au sein de l'Astra Militarum{/d} suffira amplement. Il suffit de manipuler la culasse pour coincer l'obus à l'intérieur du canon et enflammer sa chambre...{/n}

languages.text: {n}哪怕你并不了解远古技术的来龙去脉，也足以轻松实现你的目标。你拥有{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}在星界军服役的经历{/d}，这种事情对你而言轻而易举。你简单操作了一下大炮后膛，顺利地将炮弹卡在炮管内，整个炮膛熊熊燃烧起来……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哪怕你并不了解远古技术的来龙去脉，也足以轻松实现你的目标。你简单地操作了一下大炮后膛，顺利地将炮弹卡在炮管内，整个炮膛熊熊燃烧起来……{/n}

languages.text: {n}やろうとしていることを実行するのに、すべての古代技術は必要はない。あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}帝国防衛軍における経験{/d}がそれを保証してくれる。尾栓を操作して、弾を砲身内に詰め込み、薬室に火を起こせばいいだけだ…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}やろうとしていることを実行するのに、すべての古代技術は必要はない。尾栓を操作して、弾をチューブに詰め込み、薬室に火を起こせばいいだけだ…{/n}

languages.text: {n}No se necesita un amplio conocimiento de la tecnología antigua para hacer lo que pretendes: tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}experiencia en el Astra Militarum{/d} es más que suficiente. Basta con manipular el cierre para atascar el proyectil dentro del tubo y provocar un incendio en la recámara...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No se necesita un amplio conocimiento de la tecnología antigua para hacer lo que pretendes: sería suficiente con manipular el cierre para atascar el proyectil dentro del tubo y provocar un incendio en la recámara...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yapmaya niyetlendiğin şey için kadim teknolojinin tüm inceliklerine hâkim olman gerekmiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Astra Militarum günlerinde{/d} edindiğin deneyimler kâfi gelecektir. Kama yatağını biraz döndürüp namludaki kovanı sıkıştırarak haznede patlamasını sağlamak yeter de artar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It does not take knowledge of the ins and outs of ancient technology to do what you intend to do — your experience from your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}time in the Astra Militarum{/d} is sure to suffice. A simple manipulation of the breech block is enough to jam the shell inside the tube and cause a fire in the chamber...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yapmaya niyetlendiğin şey için kadim teknolojinin tüm inceliklerine hâkim olman gerekmiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Astra Militarum günlerinde{/d} edindiğin deneyimler kâfi gelecektir. Kama yatağını biraz döndürüp namludaki kovanı sıkıştırarak haznede patlamasını sağlamak yeter de artar.{/n}
